author: bmwlego
title: Elephant
review: Bought this set on clearance at the LEGO store in Orlando while on vacation at Disney World. Cute little set that has a hinged brick for the elephant's trunk. The ears move forwards and back too. The color scheme works well for the subject. This is a basic little set with few parts (34 pieces). The alternate model is a walrus. The 1x2 white plates with minifig handles is used for the elephant and walrus tusks which is a neat idea. If this set wasn't on clearance I would have never purchased it. Cute but not much else.

author: Exo_brick
title: Total
review: Man, I ate months worth of total for this set! Not anything wrong with it, even comes with alternative model instructions. I got it for free, considering I eat total for breakfast a lot of the time. Cute design. Very nice. 5/5

author: MCAdventureCity
title: First set
review: This cute set was my first. I got it out of a cereal box. I got it when I was four. It is a good set. the elephant's ears flap and trunk moves. before that I had duplo, but I am now too old for the duplo. Thank you!
